Class CallModule.DefaultImpls

  • com.bandyer.android_sdk.call.CallModule.DefaultImpls
  • Enclosing interface:
    CallModule

    public static class CallModule.DefaultImpls

    Module used for audio&video communication.

      static void addCallObserver(CallModule $this, androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity activity, CallObserver observer)
      Observe the starting or ending event of a call from an activity. The observer is automatically disposed when activity is destroyed.

      Observe the starting or destroy event of an activity created for calls. The observer is automatically disposed when activity is destroyed.

      • setVerified

        public static void setVerified(CallModule $this,
                               Call call,
                               boolean verified)

        This function allows the logged user to broadcast to other call participants that has been verified or not within the host app.

        Parameters:
        call - call to verify
        verified - true if the logged user has been verified, false otherwise.

        callDisplayMode - mode in which to display the call
